description:
There was a change in the shooting schedule and Christina landed on my set. With nothing in particular planned for that day I decided to do my first non stop shoot.
Holy fuck! This woman is HOT! She is able to take anything I do to her or put in her. Watch as she goes from pleasure, to defiance, to exhaustion to pure fear! All with mind blowing orgasms!
NOT TO BE MISSED!
title: Christina Carter: NON STOP orgasmic shoot! Need I say more?
